item.description:
It is pretty simple really, I am basically a lazy person and I want you to trim my Xmas tree for me.

The theme for our monthly cooking club is "anything goes".Cook at home or cook here (I think this one lends itself to more potluck than on site cooking), make whatever you want, wear whatever you want, and bring whomever you want. All I ask is that you help me put my ornaments and do-dads on my tree and that you have a good time.

We'll start a bit earlier than usual so that if you have other parties or events you can attend both and it is on the first Friday not the second Friday.

The holidays are more magical with you so please attend!

Â
item.how_to_find_us: try to park off the street!
item.name: Anything Goes Tree Trimming party
